com.myscript.atk.itc

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.myscript.atk.itc.Transform

  • public class Transform
extends Object
    The Transform class represents an affine transformation in 2D space.

    Transformations can be identity (no transformation), translation,
    scaling, or a combination of these.

    Transformations can be applied on points, rectangles and paths.
